scripts.start: concurrently "npm run set:prod" "npm run start:react " "npm run start:svelte"  "npm run start:vue"  "npm run start:imba" "npm run start:layout"
scripts.start:react: cd podlets/react-pod && npm run build && nodemon index.js
scripts.start:svelte: cd podlets/svelte-pod && npm run build && nodemon index.js
scripts.start:vue: cd podlets/vue-pod && npm run build && nodemon index.js
scripts.start:imba: cd podlets/imba-pod && npm run build && nodemon index.js
